metadata.name: Maiden
metadata.description:
This is a collaboration with my dear talented friend @Angad who composed the poem:

"She still haunts me
That maiden so fair
Sat in her window
With flowers in her hair.
Who does she dream of
In her infinite stare?
Who is it at the end of that distant gaze?
Who does she long for?
Whose sweet embrace
Will bring a smile
To that beautiful face?
I hadnâ€™t thought about her for a few days. 
But she still haunts me
That maiden so fair
Sat in her window
With flowers in her hair."

Image created in collaboration with AI, Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Premiere Pro.
